attributes.action: Postpone the analogue TV shutdown until terrestial digital transmissions (Freeview) can be received satisfactorily by all who will lose the analogue signals - or, alternatively, compensate those adversely affected by the switch off of analogue transmissions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The planned shut down of analogue TV will disadvantage those whose terrestial signal is currently too poor to support terrestial digital transmissions via Freeview decoders.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
